articles.title: Covid: AZ blood clots update due as UK starts Moderna jabs - BBC News
articles.description: UK and European regulators are to give updates on whether the AstraZeneca vaccine is causing blood clots.
articles.content:

articles.title: Writing on wall for Dublin Euros games as lack of crowd 'guarantee' narrows UEFA options - Independent.ie
articles.description: UEFA are preparing to replace Dublin as co-hosts of this summer’s European Championships – and could make the call as early as today although issues in other cities may delay the inevitable.
articles.content:

articles.title: Clock is ticking on Honda Civic Type R orders - Autocar - NZ Autocar
articles.description: The end of an era will come later this year, as Honda’s European division prepares to close its Swindon production plant — simultaneously ending production of the current award-winning FK8-generation Civic Type R.
